abstract: The move would mark a major milestone in the countries’ trade relations and could improve Intel’s competitiveness.
snippet: The move would mark a major milestone in the countries’ trade relations and could improve Intel’s competitiveness.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, March 22 — Intel appears set to build a chip fabrication plant in northern China, a move that would mark a major milestone in the countries’ trade relations and could improve Intel’s competitiveness as it moves operations closer to its biggest customers.

headline.main: Intel, Already With Operations in China, Appears Ready to Build a Chip Plant There
headline.print_headline: Intel, Already With Operations in China, Appears Ready to Build a Chip Plant There
